statements: DELETE FROM unsubscribe_rates WHERE reason = 'spam' AND unsubscribe_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM unsubscribe_rates WHERE customer_id = 101 AND reason = 'No longer interested';
DELETE FROM unsubscribe_rates WHERE reason = 'Spam' AND customer_id = 202;
DELETE FROM unsubscribe_rates WHERE user_id = 100 AND reason = 'No longer interested';
DELETE FROM customer_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Inactive' OR activity_type = 'Cancelled';
DELETE FROM unsubscribe_rates WHERE customer_id = 12345 AND unsubscribe_date = '2022-10-15';
DELETE FROM customer_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Login' AND activity_date < '2022-09-01';
DELETE FROM customer_activity WHERE user_id = 100 AND activity_type = 'login';
DELETE FROM UnsubscribeLogs WHERE user_id = 100 AND reason_id = 1;
